activities: DiscoveryWorks Legal is a top tier E-Discovery firm solely focused on providing Litigation Support Services from early case assessment and forensic collection to managed hosting through document review.  Our clients are top nationally recognized law firms and Fortune 500 corporate counsel who give us Electronic data such as Emails and Electronic User Files to process them. We extract data from these files, also known as E-Discovery, and securely present them to our clients and their legal counsel for review.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: DiscoveryWorks Legal Inc is a member of BBBOnline EU Safe Harbor Program. Our BBB registration number is: EU6182902-16-09.
recoursemech: Private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms of BBBOnline that incorporate the safe harbor framework or EU data protection authorities.
